Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 56th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1965...
Traded from Baltimore to Los Angeles (N) on 4/1/1965 (Going to LAN: 3B F. Jaciuk, P G. Rounsaville. Going to BAL: P B. Lee, RF F. Alou)...
Injured on 8/1/1965 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/23/1967, off Dave Leonhard (NYM)...
Earned first career win on 5/11/1967...
Injured on 5/29/1967 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1968, winning 2 games with a 1.53 ERA...
Injured on 5/5/1969 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/10/1971 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 6/15/1972 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 3/1/1976 to a minor league contract.
Drafted in 3rd round, 50th overall pick, by Boston in 1978...
Earned first career win on 6/15/1983...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
